sentences.en: a secret underground passage
sentences.cn: 地下秘密通道

sentences.en: an underground passage
sentences.cn: 地下通道

sentences.en: an underground resistance movement
sentences.cn: 地下抵抗运动

sentences.en: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车线路和地上地下路轨都在该站交汇。

sentences.en: During the blitz we spent the night in underground shelters.
sentences.cn: 空袭期间,我们在防空洞过夜.

sentences.en: He crossed London by underground.
sentences.cn: 他乘地铁穿过伦敦。

sentences.en: He was a courier for the Polish underground and parachuted into Warsaw.
sentences.cn: 他是波兰地下组织的情报员，被空降到华沙。

sentences.en: I don't travel on the underground late at night.
sentences.cn: 我深夜不坐地铁。

sentences.en: London has a well - developed underground system.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的地铁很发达.

sentences.en: nuclear waste buried deep underground
sentences.cn: 深埋在地下的核废物

sentences.en: The car park is underground.
sentences.cn: 停车场在地下。

sentences.en: The inves-tigators found that the underground pipes were badly corroded.
sentences.cn: 调查人员发现地下管道严重腐蚀。

sentences.en: The mole bored its way underground.
sentences.cn: 鼹鼠在地下挖掘路.

sentences.en: The railway track goes underground for a short distance.
sentences.cn: 铁轨有一段不长的路程铺设在地下.

sentences.en: The underground is ideal for getting to work in Milan.
sentences.cn: 在米兰，乘地铁去上班非常便捷。

sentences.en: There's an underground passageway that connects the five buildings.
sentences.cn: 有一条地下通道连接着那5栋大楼。

sentences.en: They are accused of organising and financing an underground youth movement.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控组织并资助地下青年运动。

sentences.en: Thirty miners were trapped underground after the fire.
sentences.cn: 起火后有三十名矿工被困在地底下.

sentences.en: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.cn: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.en: This is the biggest underground lake yet discovered.
sentences.cn: 这是迄今为止所发现的最大地下湖.
